blog.name: icythot-bakuhoe
blog.title: BNHA Headcanons and Matchups! 🍑
blog.description: Matchups are CLOSED! Headcanons are CLOSED! Make sure to read the rules before you send in a request!

summary: I'm kinda curious but whats a supernatural matchup?? I've never heard of it before!
question: I'm kinda curious but whats a supernatural matchup?? I've never heard of it before!
answer:
Ah! I kind of got an idea where for the supernatural matchup, I’d pair someone with not only a creature but a BNHA and turn it into a bit of an AU! For example, if I paired someone with a werewolf, I’d give them not only their rank, but perhaps who their mate would be! That, or a mentor, who turned them, etc (depending on platonic or romantic, or other factors)—and maybe a little snippet of their lives together in that sort of style!

I hope it’s not stupid or anything, but I thought it would be pretty fun for whoever’s interested in giving it a go! >< 💕💝

blog.name: quirky-hero-imagines
blog.title: BNHA Imagines
blog.description:
Heyo! Another imagines and writing BNHA blog because there can never be enough💕 INBOX IS CLOSED [33]

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: First of all, your work is incredible. You are one of the top 3 bnha writers in my book! I was wondering if you could write some...
question: First of all, your work is incredible. You are one of the top 3 bnha writers in my book! I was wondering if you could write some of Denki shocking his s/o during sex, either on purpose or accidentally. Once again you're awesome!
answer:
Thank you for sending a request ❤️

Awww I’m so happy to hear that!

Be warned ‼️ Smut/lemon‼️


Beats of sweat roll over Denki’s chest as he thrust into you at a fast pace. You can feel his body shaking from the overwhelming pleasure, you yourself moaning and writing underneath him.

Denki grabs onto your hips, his fingers digging into your skin. You hear him curse before a jolt of electricity runs through your body, Denki accidentally releasing small sparks of it from his palms.

You yelp in shock and he immediately pulls away, looking just as shocked as you. “Shit y/n, are you okay?!” Denki asks you worriedly. You nod your head, not able to hold back a giggle.

Denki looks relieved as you laugh, a smile showing on his face as well. After the initial shock you only feel a bit tingly at the spots on your hips where his hands were. “I’m glad it didn’t hurt you, sorry.” Denki says and you pull him close, humming in response. “Maybe if you do it softer it can feel nice.” You tell him, a seductive smirk showing on your face.

Denki pushes himself between your legs again with a grin. “I’ll work on it.” He says before pulling you into a passionate kiss.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

summary: I did the right thing (I think)
title: I did the right thing (I think)
description:
by lxmonade

“why wont you report him” Izuku asked again. He asked every time Todoroki came to him, beaten and crying and hurt. And every time he asked Todoroki had the same response, expression shifting to tired, or more tired if possible, his eyes would look away from Izuku’s and he would let out a sigh, lips parting slightly.

A story in which Izuku reports Shouto’s father to the police for abuse and years of pain and conflict ensue.

Words: 1714, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

title: Kaminari’s electrification
body:
guess who did another one!

since my next fics are taking a hot minute to finish, I figured I’d do another analysis while I work on them. The fics are gonna be for the MHA Noir week, so while I probably won’t be able to do the whole week ‘cause of how long they’re taking, I’m really excited about them.

I’m also gonna try to keep this analysis a bit shorter and to the point to see if I like doing it that way more.

Kaminari’s electrification gives him the ability to generate and discharge his own electricity, at the cost of him short-circuiting his brain by going past his wattage limit.

My theory is that his electricity is generated in a way similar to stingrays and eels. These animals have modified muscle cells called electrocytes which generate electricity when stimulated, producing discharge. I suspect that kaminari’s discharge is as strong as it is due to a combination of training, more electrocytes, and quirk singularity.

I suspect that his drawback is a combination of the concept of quirk singularity and evolution simply not compensating. The concept of quirk singularity simply states that eventually quirks will evolve to the point that they can no longer be controlled. I theorize that the reason for his short-circuiting is due to the fact that his nervous system and brain are not designed to handle the amount of resulting current his body is producing, and that the current of his electricity is in fact causing minute damage to his brain. While this may not seem extremely severe, consider how many times he’s short circuited in the series, and how many times he must have short-circuited growing up and learning to control his quirk. I believe that this might be the reason for his academic struggles, as I don’t believe him to be an idiot, as he has been shown to make the hand sign for the right hand rule typically used by physicists when dealing with magnetic forces and electric charges when using his quirk. However, due to the damage caused by the current from his quirks electricity, I worry that he in fact has permanent brain damage.

trail.content:
guess who did another one!

since my next fics are taking a hot minute to finish, I figured I’d do another analysis while I work on them. The fics are gonna be for the MHA Noir week, so while I probably won’t be able to do the whole week ‘cause of how long they’re taking, I’m really excited about them.

I’m also gonna try to keep this analysis a bit shorter and to the point to see if I like doing it that way more.

Kaminari’s electrification gives him the ability to generate and discharge his own electricity, at the cost of him short-circuiting his brain by going past his wattage limit.

My theory is that his electricity is generated in a way similar to stingrays and eels. These animals have modified muscle cells called electrocytes which generate electricity when stimulated, producing discharge. I suspect that kaminari’s discharge is as strong as it is due to a combination of training, more electrocytes, and quirk singularity.

I suspect that his drawback is a combination of the concept of quirk singularity and evolution simply not compensating. The concept of quirk singularity simply states that eventually quirks will evolve to the point that they can no longer be controlled. I theorize that the reason for his short-circuiting is due to the fact that his nervous system and brain are not designed to handle the amount of resulting current his body is producing, and that the current of his electricity is in fact causing minute damage to his brain. While this may not seem extremely severe, consider how many times he’s short circuited in the series, and how many times he must have short-circuited growing up and learning to control his quirk. I believe that this might be the reason for his academic struggles, as I don’t believe him to be an idiot, as he has been shown to make the hand sign for the right hand rule typically used by physicists when dealing with magnetic forces and electric charges when using his quirk. However, due to the damage caused by the current from his quirks electricity, I worry that he in fact has permanent brain damage.

cuz i get that with this
first time i laid down colors i realized it looked like my B&G zine piece
and all of the elements/set pieces/whatever are the same too
and i honestly don't know if it's a good thing or a bad thing
